categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the New Jedi Order

nodes.text: Romor was a Jedi apprentice of the New Jedi Order. She was the nurse on duty in the Halls of Healing during Valin Horn's escape from the Jedi Temple in 43.5 ABY. Horn knocked her out before taking her lightsaber and leaving. Romor had a concussion but would recover soon.
